instructions.title: How To Delete Your Black People Meet Account
instructions.before: You cannot delete your Black People Meet Account from the mobile app.  You must delete your account by navigating through the website.
thingsToRemember: Please note, all emails, photos, records relating to your profile, remaining time and account will be immediately removed from the site.
If you would later like to join BlackPeopleMeet again, you will have to create a new profile from scratch.
If you just want to take a break, you can hide BlackPeopleMeet profile. You can do so from the same settings tab that allows you to delete BlackPeopleMeet profile.
If you signed up for BlackPeopleMeet using a third-party login such as Facebook or Twitter, you probably want to revoke all access from BlackPeopleMeet.

steps: Go to the Black People Meet Website. If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Black People Meet home page.
Click on your Settings located at the top right section of your screen
Click My Account from the drop down menu
Scroll down to Account Status and then Click the View Account Status link
On the next screen, click the Other Account Status Changes link
Click the Remove My Profile link
Choose an Option and then continue
Choose another Option and then continue
Type in Delete My Account and then Remove My Profile
Click Remove My Profile to Confirm
This screen will appear to Confirm Delete
